metadata.title: CVE-2020-36317 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the standard library in Rust before 1.49.0, String::retain() functionhas a panic safety problem. It allows creation of a non-UTF-8 Rust stringwhen the provided closure panics. This bug could result in a memory safetyviolation when other string APIs assume that UTF-8 encoding is used on thesame string.

criterions.comment: rustc package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
